thread.title: Weinstein Co. and N.Y. Attorney General in Last-Ditch Talks to Avert Bankruptcy

author: Ben Fritz
title: Weinstein Co. and N.Y. Attorney General in Last-Ditch Talks to Avert Bankruptcy
text:
In a bid to avoid bankruptcy and a government lawsuit, Weinstein Co.’s board Thursday was meeting with a potential buyers’ group including investor Ron Burkle at the office of the New York attorney general, said people with knowledge of the talks.

The discussions, prompted by Mr. Burkle, could lead New York Attorney General Eric Schneiderman to settle his lawsuit against Weinstein Co. and its co-chairman, Bob Weinstein, though a civil suit against the company’s former co-chairman, Harvey Weinstein, would continue, one of the... RELATED VIDEO How Harvey and Bob Weinstein Built an Independent Film Empire Through Miramax and then The Weinstein Company, Harvey and Bob Weinstein became two of the leading forces behind the independent film movement of the 1990s -- in the process making millions of dollars and earning more than 200 Oscar nominations. WSJ's Mark Kelly reports. To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
